publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-559 Mr Jack McConnell: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Parliament in consideration of the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.

S1M-559 Mr Jack McConnell: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Parliament in consideration of the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.
S1M-559 Mr Jack McConnell: The Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Parliament in consideration of the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2000 approves the Order.
